div.p: It’s an online tool built to help game developers to create simple sprite sheets for theirs games, it has some basic drawing functions like brush, eraser, fill bucket and others.There are also tools to export an spritesheet image and watch an animation preview.
SpriteFoundry has been tested on the newer Firefox and Chrome, but it should work on Opera and Safari as well, although we don’t support IE due its lack of HTML5 features.

We use integrated Google Account authentication in order to relate you to your files. However, we don’t have access to your password, we only make use of your email address. You may use the link on the upper right corner on the screen to log in the application or you can also test it without authentication, but you won’t be able to save your files.
